overview:
SEO Services

Welcome to the SEO company, a dedicated SEO services company in Mumbai, India that offers reasonable SEO services serving local, national and international clients outside India as well. We take up all kinds of SEO services, PPC Services, Internet Marketing Services, Link Building, Content Writing Services and PHP MySQL Web Development. We also help you design and develop SEO friendly web sites for all kinds of businesses to ensure that you earn more profits and expand your business to new heights.

With our SEO Services you would achieve:

Increased Sales - Higher qualified traffic and increased business.
Increased Visibility - And Branding in your target market.
Competitive Edge - Move ahead of your competition, establish trust and credibility of your business.
Maximized Value - Maximum value for lowest possible marketing cost.

We are a highly reputed SEO services company in Mumbai, india that provides different SEO services, SEO web designing, PPC Management services and social media optimization at economical rates. Our professional SEO experts, link building experts help you design your site for optimum results. Our target is to ensure satisfaction to our clients and to grow their business so that they see a return on their investment. Most of our clients today are enjoying a Google Top 10, Top 5 and No. 1 ranking that help them to expand their business further.

Our team of SEO professionals performs marketing research, suggest the best search engine, marketing channel like SEO and Social Media Optimization, Google Sponsor Listing (Paid Listing) and how to make a SEO and Social Media friendly site for your online business and implement the plan accordingly.

Why SEO Services? Search Engine Optimization is very important to the performance of natural search results. Organic SEO offers best ROI as well as top internet status. Around 80 percent of your site visitors will find your site on one major search engines. The problem is that there are millions of web sites today trying to get the top position on those search engines. However, only first 20 sites are able to convert their visitors into customers, the other web sites fail to do that. SEO Services would achieve your Business Objectives:

Increase brand visibility in the marketplace helping you experiences an increase in traffic, leads and sales.
Force high-quality traffic to your website Maximize Money Making Opportunities.
Target shoppers interested in your products and Eliminate wasted advertising expenditures.
Leap ahead of your competitors.
Built-in audience Website and Grow your business online in less time for less money Place your business in front of the right audience at the right time.

Importance of proper SEO Services:

SEO is top online marketing strategy.
60%-80% of all web site traffic comes from the search engines.
SEO pulls more traffic than PPC (Pay per Click).
Natural listings are perceived to be non-biased.
SEO gives better ROI than any other marketing medium.
No bidding wars or clicks fraud in SEO.
SEO Helps in creating an online brand.

SEO services that we offer are:

SEO services for Google
SEO services for Yahoo
SEO services for Bing
SEO services for all other search engines
Multilanguage SEO services
SEO services by country
Global SEO services
Local Business Center SEO services
Flash SEO services
Pharma SEO services
CSS SEO services
CMS SEO services
Dynamic SEO services

Our Starter SEO package is most suitable for small or start-up businesses looking for an affordable SEO solution for promoting their websites online. Itâ€™s also appropriate for websites targeting local searches i.e. key phrases which do not have heavy competition. Our Starter SEO Package includes:

5 Guaranteed keyword searches in most popular Search Engines like Google, Yahoo, MSN, AltaVista, AOL, Lycos etc
200 manual Search Engine submissions
200 manual submissions to top 200 online directories like Dmoz etc
100 manual submissions to 100 best Article directories
30 minutes of Free SEO Recommendation Services from our SEO experts
Monthly comprehensive Search Engine Ranking Reports

Since SEO is a continuous process and the fact that the gestation period is 3-4 months to see any major improvements. Regular maintenance activity also ensures that the results achieved are sustained as halting the SEO campaign may lead to you loosing out your ranking to your competitors who’re aggressively fighting to appear on the same phrases as yours.

Maintenance Services, where we offer you all of the above services at a nominal monthly charge of just $200!!
